name: Build FutureClient

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "master", "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "master", "main" ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      # 1. Repository ka code checkout karein
      - name: Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # 2. Java 17 setup karein (Minecraft 1.20.1 ke liye required)
      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'temurin'

      # 3. Gradle wrapper ko execute permission dein
      - name: Make gradlew executable
        run: chmod +x ./gradlew

      # 4. Cache Gradle packages (Build speed badhane ke liye)
      - name: Cache Gradle packages
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: |
            ~/.gradle/caches
            ~/.gradle/wrapper
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*', '**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-

      # 5. Mod Build karein
      - name: Build with Gradle
        run: ./gradlew build

      # 6. Built JAR file ko artifact ki tarah upload karein
      - name: Upload Mod Artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: FutureClient-Build
          path: build/libs/*.jar
          retention-days: 7
